item.title: Precision Time Portal Availability
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Equinix Precision Time™ services experiencing intermittent issues

Equinix Precision Time™ services on the Portal are currently experiencing intermittent issues, impacting user access and functionality. The team is actively investigating the cause of the disruption and working to restore normal operations.

Feb 26, 21:08 UTC
Resolved - The issue impacting Equinix Precision Time™ services on the Precision Time portal has been resolved.

Feb 26, 21:03 UTC
Investigating - Equinix Precision Time™ services on the Portal are currently experiencing intermittent issues. We are investigating and will advise once the issue has been resolved.

item.title: Link Failure (Equinix Internet Access / Equinix Connect)
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Trunk Link Flapping Incident

Equinix SMC monitored a trunk link between NY13 and NY4 that flapped and recovered within 2 seconds. No impact to service as traffic automatically rerouted to an alternate link. The issue was reported to the provider for investigation.

Feb 25, 23:05 UTC

item.title: Network Component Issue (Equinix Internet Access / Equinix Connect, Network Edge)
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Incident: Platform Downtime

We are currently investigating a major incident that has caused platform downtime. We are working to resolve this issue as quickly as possible. [Medium] - Performance Degradation: Network Connectivity

We are currently investigating performance degradation in network connectivity and are working to address the issue. [Low] - Scheduled Maintenance: Equinix Internet Access

item.title: Provider Issue (Network Edge, Equinix Fabric)
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - Equinix Fabric Backbone Provider Link Flapping Incident Summary: The Equinix Fabric backbone provider link between EMEA and AMER was flapping, but there was no service impact as traffic was automatically rerouted to an alternate link. The issue was reported to the provider for investigation.

Feb 23, 20:03 UTC
Resolved - SMC monitored that one of Equinix Fabric backbone provider links between EMEA and AMER is flapping. No service impact as traffic automatically rerouted to alternate link. The issue was reported to provider for investigation..

Next Action: The issue will be verified with the circuit provider..

item.title: Provider Issue (Equinix Fabric)
item.content:encoded:
Feb 23, 08:23 UTC
Resolved - Equinix Fabric backbone provider (Vocus) has identified the fault location and still working on restoration plan. There is no ETR available at the moment.

Next Action: Equinix SMC will closely follow up with provider on the process of restoration..

426qrj3jqcc4

Incident Number: INC0025564
[Equinix Fabric - Asia-Pacific (PE, SG)]

[Equinix Fabric - Asia-Pacific (PE, SG)]

Jan 12, 04:59 UTC
Update - Vocus has identified a fault condition on the Australia Singapore Cable System impacting all services. Carrier has narrowed down fault in the cable system to the North of the Anyer branching unit in Indonesian waters. Engineers are now working with Marine repair vessel to establish a repair plan. No ETR has been provided..

426qrj3jqcc4
